title: Willy the Silly-Haired Snowman's Great Adventure
description: Join Willy, Molly, and Mayor Sigmund to see what happens when the silly-haired snowman comes to Snowflake, "The Snowman Capital of the World." Molly soon finds out that Willy has the warmest, happiest heart in Snowflake even though he is made from snow. Just like Molly, you will find a best friend in Willy the Silly-Haired Snowman. Join the fun today.
author: Connie Clyburn
